channel.title: Papers on Charles Marsh
channel.description: Recent content in Papers on Charles Marsh

item.title: Common-Collector and Common-Emitter as Microphone Amplifiers
item.description: IEEE style paper analyzing the performance characteristics of common-collector and common-emitter configurations as microphone amplifiers in circuit analysis class.

item.title: Natural Frequency and Quality Factor of Low-Pass and Band-Pass Circuits
item.description: IEEE style paper analyzing the natural frequency and quality factor characteristics of low-pass and band-pass filter circuits in circuit analysis class.
